title: To Hygeia
lines: Charming queen of all, lovely and blooming, blessed Hygeia, mother of all, bringer of bliss, hear me.
Through you vanish the illnesses that afflict man, through you every house blossoms to the fullness of joy.
The arts thrive when the world desires you, O queen, loathed by Hades, the destroyer of souls.
Apart from you all is without profit for men: wealth, the sweet giver of abundance for those who feast, fails, and man never reaches the many pains of old age.
Goddess, come, ever-helpful to the initiates, keep away the evil distress of unbearable diseases.
